name: Barrel Bowl
description:
MUST Play in Full Screen: NOT WORKING?... Download below: Barrel Bowl is a physics based, barrel rolling, scroll wheel spinning, pin knocking arcade game... All the input you need is a scroll wheel. Controls: (Scroll-Wheel ONLY) Spin the scroll wheel to move forwards or backwards... Press the scroll wheel to enter aiming mode. While aiming the scroll wheel is used to rotate the barrel. Pressing the scroll wheel again will launch the barrel forward...

Other Optional: Press "E" to return to menu...

Press "R" to restart...
